org.openadaptor.auxil.processor.javascript
Class JavascriptProcessor

java.lang.Object
  org.openadaptor.core.Component
      org.openadaptor.auxil.processor.javascript.JavascriptProcessor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Administrable, IComponent, IDataProcessor
Direct Known Subclasses:
JavascriptConditionProcessor, JavascriptFilterProcessor
Deprecated. replaced by more flexible map based script processors: ScriptProcessor

public class JavascriptProcessor
extends Component
implements IDataProcessor

Executes javascript scripts in the context of the data record.
This expects to be configured with a script containing javascript to be executed in the context of supplied records.

Author:
higginse

Field Detail

DEFAULT_BOUND_NAME

public static final java.lang.String DEFAULT_BOUND_NAME
Deprecated. 
This is the default name by which the input object may be referenced from within the javascript script.
e.g. record.set("mid", (record.get("bid") + record.get("offer")) / 2)

See Also:

Method Detail

setBoundName

public void setBoundName(java.lang.String name)
Deprecated. 
Set the name by which supplied objects may be referred to within the javascript.
The default value is DEFAULT_BOUND_NAME

getBoundName

public java.lang.String getBoundName()
Deprecated. 
Return the name by which supplied objects may be referred to within the javascript.
The default value is DEFAULT_BOUND_NAME

Deprecated. 
Assign the javascript to be executed by this processor

Parameters:

process

public java.lang.Object[] process(java.lang.Object input)
Deprecated. 
Execute javascript in the context of the supplied record.
Note that any javascript specific exceptions will manifest themselves as RuntimeExceptions.

Specified by:
process in interface IDataProcessor
Returns:
Object[] containing the result of executing the javascript with the supplied input record.

generateOutput

protected java.lang.Object[] generateOutput(JavascriptProcessor.JavascriptResult jsResult)
Deprecated. 
Generate an output record array from a returned JavascriptResult.
Default behaviour is just to wrap the outputRecord in an Object[].
This method exists primarily as a hook to allow it to be overridden (for example, to allow the javascript result value to be returned instead).

validate

public void validate(java.util.List exceptions)
Deprecated. 
Checks that the mandatory properties have been set. script is a mandatory property.

While it is valid to supply a blank script we write a warning to the logs as the processor will not modify the data.

Specified by:
validate in interface IDataProcessor
Parameters:
exceptions - list of exceptions that any validation errors will be appended to

reset

public void reset(java.lang.Object context)
Deprecated. 
Description copied from interface: IDataProcessor
Allows calling code to communicate context information, the implementation will cast the context to an expected type.

Specified by:
reset in interface IDataProcessor
Parameters:
context -
See Also:
IReadConnector.getReaderContext()

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] argv)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Deprecated. 
Convenience mechanism to allow ad-hoc execution of javascript (for debugging only). Note: It is very inefficient - instantiating a new processor for each executed script.

Parameters:
argv - argumens of the form name=value for pre-populating the test map.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - on I/O problems.
